user.title: Configure Hinen Solar
user.description:
Enter your Hinen Developer Platform credentials. You can obtain your Client ID and Client Secret from the Hinen Developer Platform at https://developer.celinksmart.com

The redirect URL will be auto-detected, but you can customize it if needed (e.g., for external access).

abort.already_configured: This Hinen account is already configured.
abort.conflict_with_official:
⚠️ Integration Conflict Detected

The official {integration_name} integration is already installed. Due to API session limitations, both integrations cannot run simultaneously on the same Hinen account.

Options:
1. Use only Hinen Solar Advanced (remove Hinen Power first)
2. Use only Hinen Power (cancel this setup)
3. Use separate Hinen accounts (share devices between accounts)

For more information, see: https://github.com/jnctech/hinen-solar-homeassistant#compatibility
